lead_paragraph: Colombia scored two first half goals to tame hosts the United States and open the Copa America tournament with a convincing 2-0 victory in front of a big crowd on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Colombia Down U.S. Hosts 2-0 in Copa Opener
headline.main: Colombia Down U.S. Hosts 2-0 in Copa Opener

snippet: Colombia scored two first half goals to tame hosts the United States and open the Copa America tournament with a convincing 2-0 victory in front of a big crowd on Friday....
